name: BookFlight
description: This API books an air ticket from the given from_city to the given to_city.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date of takeoff. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: from_city
parameters.description: The city from which the flight departs

parameters.name: to_city
parameters.description: The city where the flight arrives

parameters.name: price_upperbound
parameters.description: The highest acceptable airfare. It can be empty (null), indicating no upper limit.

example.output: The 3U8885 flight from Beijing to Shanghai at 2023-09-13 07:40:00 has been successfully booked, and the price is 1320 yuan.
